rooms.description: A spacious entrance area that complies with Vastu principles by welcoming positive energy. Natural ventilation through large windows.
An open-plan living space designed for joint family gatherings; incorporates large windows and skylights to ensure natural light and cross ventilation.
A minimalist dining area adjacent to the living room, featuring ample seating space. Vastu-aligned layout with proper directional orientation for prosperity.
Fully equipped kitchen designed for efficiency; placed in an appropriate position per Vastu guidelines to enhance family harmony and energy flow.
Conveniently located on the ground floor for guests with adherence to local building codes.
A dedicated private gym area designed to integrate natural light and ventilation; soundproofed flooring for joint family comfort.
